description: Assigns the specified security profiles to the specified user.

parameters.name: SecurityProfileIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the security profiles for the user. (string) ---

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The identifier of the user account.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.
